channel.title: Bitcoin is the currency of the resistence
channel.description:
http://maxkeiser1.blogspot.com/2011/06/max-keiser-bitcoin-currency-of.html
Going back to another thread saying bitcoin was a ponzi scheme. Max Keiser doesn't bullshit.

item.title: Bitcoin is the currency of the resistence
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

Funny that since I posted last in this thread I did a complete 180 on bitcoin.

I realise one thing that stopped me trading runescape stuff for real money was not wanting people to know my real name.

Though Max Keiser is still a dickhead.

Read full topic

item.title: Bitcoin is the currency of the resistence
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:37, topic:398475”][quote author=yakman link=topic=495611.msg3639314#msg3639314 date=1308853488]
Mopman tell us how you imagine the sequence of events that result in bitcoin becoming stable enough.
[/quote]
I don’t think he is saying it will definitely stabilize, I think he is saying that it is possible, which it certainly is.[/quote]

Even so, he can still give us what he imagines to be a mechanism for bitcoins becoming stable.

Read full topic

item.description:

Mopman:

Agreed, it’s those who think it’s impossible for it to ever stabilise that I don’t agree with

Yea, I don’t agree with that either.

yakman:

Mopman tell us how you imagine the sequence of events that result in bitcoin becoming stable enough.

I don’t think he is saying it will definitely stabilize, I think he is saying that it is possible, which it certainly is.

item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Mopman:

I’d like to see what the USD looked like if somebody managed to steal a bunch of it a short while after it started picking up in the first place

You are correct, but that is why bitcoin isn’t stable enough to use right at this moment for anything serious, like I said before.

item.title: Bitcoin is the currency of the resistence
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

So the only point of Bitcoin is for interest and selling illegal things anonymously? I’m fine with drugs and shit, but weapons, cp, all that weird shit. I just don’t think it’s worth it for allowing pedos to trade more securely.

Thanks for grouping weapons with child porn, asshole. Seriously though, look on the bright side, maybe some of the weapons can be used to kill pedophiles?

From the looks of Bitcoin though, it’s still far too unstable to be used for anything serious in the near future.

Read full topic

this is fantastic these are the new Forbes fortune list these are the bitcoin fortunes it is all numbers it is pure anonymous and this is the biggest story of this decade going forward is the transtion from the old way of doing business around the world to the bitcoin way of doing business which is purely anonymous and this is the great achievement of the global insurrection against banker occupation Bitcoin is the Currency of Resistance
